description: XBoard is a News Feed website that showcases the latest news on selected topics from Flipboard. This project focuses on front-end development, implementing dynamic UI elements like Accordions and Image Carousels to enhance the user experience.
title: XBoard

description: QTripDynamic is a travel website designed for travelers looking to explore various adventures across different cities. This project focuses on creating a dynamic, responsive front-end and integrating with backend REST APIs to fetch and display city-specific adventure options. It includes multi-select filters, carousels, and localStorage for persisting user preferences.
title: QTripDynamic

description: QTripStatic is a static travel website featuring adventure options across cities, designed to provide a visually appealing and responsive layout. This project involves creating multiple pages from wireframes using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, optimized for various devices and screen sizes.
title: QTripStatic

description: XCruise is a responsive website built from scratch to showcase cruise vacation options, offering users a seamless browsing experience for exploring cruise destinations and booking opportunities. Developed with HTML and CSS, the site includes interactive sections, a dynamic layout, and an emphasis on responsive design across devices.
title: XCruise
